description: This creature always has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA} and {CONDNAME_BUFF_MEND}. After your creatures take damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_MANIA}, a random enemy takes that damage as well. After your creatures are healed by {CONDNAME_BUFF_MEND}, a random enemy is healed for that amount as well. This trait does not stack.
name: Ignorance Is Bliss
